'''Focused Experience Mode''' is a feature that can be enabled during certain [[Quest]]s that prevents most interruptions from other quests occupying locations and [[character]]s.

==Description==
{{Description|'''Function Details'''<br>Enable Focused Experience Mode to guarantee you can complete the quest smoothly and without interruption from other quests using locations or characters.<br>· In a few cases, after enabling Focused Experience Mode, you will not be able to free up some locations or characters occupied by other quests, and will still need to finish the quest with which there is a conflict first.<br><br>'''Reminder'''<br>After enabling Focused Experience Mode for a quest, some other quests that use the same characters and locations as this quest will be affected in the following ways:<br>· Your current Hangout Event progress will be lost. After the quest for which Focused Experience Mode was enabled is completed or Focused Experience Mode is disabled, accept the quest again to continue progressing.<br>· The progress of other quests will be paused.}}
